      int Aggressive.attackPhase(GameMap gameMap, GamePlayer player, java.util.ArrayList<GamePlayer> playersList)
      This method calls the Attack method of player class by passing the aggressive player's strongest country as the attacking country and the adjacent country of the strongest country which belongs to other player as the defender country.

      this method chooses two random adjacent countries and fortifies a random number of possible armies
